message: I`m experienced javascript developer...i`m going to use php for the first time ...What is the best php framework? and what is the main differences?...i searched on the inernet but i did not get the difference between the frameworks....

data.message: Start without a framework for a better understanding
if i`m going to create a system to control the users profiles database and database of folders and file....should i work without a framework?
I mean to learn, don't use a framework. But for production code, yes akeed use one.

Zend framework is very good in terms of API availability and speed.  The main difference in frameworks Mohamed is their learning curve and how much you can get out of it.  Start with Zend in my opinion and make it a learning process.  Good luck my friend :)
Have a look at Laravel too, I used it recently, it was great and really easy to learn
Laveral php and Yii PHP Framework
Yii or CodeIgniter i think those most popular
This is why i asked y question..everyone recommend a different framework....:D
you said you are experienced javascript developer .. can i ask do you use any libraries or frameworks? and the way you think before writing JS in any new project?

In java script there are libraries like jquery and angularjs i used both ....mainly in my work i use jquery ui for creating the ui of the page but angularjs i use it for retrieving data from the server.
